greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Triangle, read by rows, where T(n,k) = C( k*(k+1)/2 + n-k + 2, n-k) for n>=k>=0.
comment: Remarkably, column k of the matrix inverse (A121437) equals signed column k of matrix power: A107876^(k*(k+1)/2 + 3) for k>=0.
results.author: _Paul D. Hanna_, Aug 25 2006
